narrative:
This applicant intends to exhibit a camel act to the general public. 
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This applicant complies with the standards and regulations to be issued a class "B" license.
Discussed  the USDA standards and regulations including; itineraries, unannounced inspections, shelter from
inclement weather, experience & knowledge of camel handlers / trainers.
The appropriate license fee needs to be sent to the eastern regional office and processed before USDA regulated
activity can be conducted.  
 
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
